project.name: rugby
project.title: Homepage for Bergen Rugbyklubb
project.paragraph: My very first, solo commercial assignment. Basically to learn XML implementation in PHP.
Among the client's requirements were articles, match reports and training schedule on the front page without lenghty vertical scrolling, as well as a concrete identity connected to rugby.
Official homepage maintained by Bergen Rugbyklubb.

project.name: jgi
project.title: Homepage for Financial Advisor client
project.paragraph: A small and simple, pure HTML/CSS page for financial advisor client Jan Greve-Isdahl.

project.name: lister
project.title: A list making application
project.paragraph: This simple list making application was created to keep track of, and share, which groceries to shop. Main focus was to learn more about MVC and OOP in PHP.
It is free, simple and basic - feel free to try it out!
